verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Make <S%H6213><s%> thee two <S%H8147><s%> trumpets <S%H2689><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>; of a whole piece <S%H4749><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> them: that thou mayest use <S%H1961><s%> them for the calling <S%H4744><s%> of the assembly <S%H5712><s%>, and for the journeying <S%H4550><s%> of the camps <S%H4264><s%>.

And when they shall blow <S%H8628><s%> with them <S%H2004><s%>, all the assembly <S%H5712><s%> shall assemble <S%H3259><s%> themselves to thee at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

And if they blow <S%H8628><s%> but with one <S%H259><s%> trumpet, then the princes <S%H5387><s%>, which are heads <S%H7218><s%> of the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, shall gather <S%H3259><s%> themselves unto thee.
When ye blow <S%H8628><s%> an alarm <S%H8643><s%>, then the camps <S%H4264><s%> that lie <S%H2583><s%> on the east parts <S%H6924><s%> shall go forward <S%H5265><s%>.

When ye blow <S%H8628><s%> an alarm <S%H8643><s%> the second time <S%H8145><s%>, then the camps <S%H4264><s%> that lie <S%H2583><s%> on the south side <S%H8486><s%> shall take their journey <S%H5265><s%>: they shall blow <S%H8628><s%> an alarm <S%H8643><s%> for their journeys <S%H4550><s%>.
But when the congregation <S%H6951><s%> is to be gathered together <S%H6950><s%>, ye shall blow <S%H8628><s%>, but ye shall not sound an alarm <S%H7321><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, the priests <S%H3548><s%>, shall blow <S%H8628><s%> with the trumpets <S%H2689><s%>; and they shall be to you for an ordinance <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>.

And if ye go <S%H935><s%> to war <S%H4421><s%> in your land <S%H776><s%> against <S%H6862><s%> the enemy that oppresseth <S%H6887><s%> you, then ye shall blow an alarm <S%H7321><s%> with the trumpets <S%H2689><s%>; and ye shall be remembered <S%H2142><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and ye shall be saved <S%H3467><s%> from your enemies <S%H341><s%>.

Also in the day <S%H3117><s%> of your gladness <S%H8057><s%>, and in your solemn days <S%H4150><s%>, and in the beginnings <S%H7218><s%> of your months <S%H2320><s%>, ye shall blow <S%H8628><s%> with the trumpets <S%H2689><s%> over your burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and over the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of your peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>; that they may be to you for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>: I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

And it came to pass on the twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day of the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, in the second <S%H8145><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, that the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up <S%H5927><s%> from off the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> took <S%H5265><s%> their journeys <S%H4550><s%> out of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>; and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> rested <S%H7931><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Paran <S%H6290><s%>.
And they first <S%H7223><s%> took their journey <S%H5265><s%> according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

In the first <S%H7223><s%> place went <S%H5265><s%> the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> according to their armies <S%H6635><s%>: and over his host was Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab <S%H5992><s%>.
And over the host <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> was Nethaneel <S%H5417><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuar <S%H6686><s%>.
And over the host <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> was Eliab <S%H446><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Helon <S%H2497><s%>.

And the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> was taken down <S%H3381><s%>; and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> set forward <S%H5265><s%>, bearing <S%H5375><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> set forward <S%H5265><s%> according to their armies <S%H6635><s%>: and over his host <S%H6635><s%> was Elizur <S%H468><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shedeur <S%H7707><s%>.
And over the host <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> was Shelumiel <S%H8017><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zurishaddai <S%H6701><s%>.
And over the host <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> was Eliasaph <S%H460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Deuel <S%H1845><s%>.

And the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> set forward <S%H5265><s%>, bearing <S%H5375><s%> the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>: and the other did set up <S%H6965><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> against they came <S%H935><s%>. the other: that is, the Gershonites and the Merarites

And the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> set forward <S%H5265><s%> according to their armies <S%H6635><s%>: and over his host <S%H6635><s%> was Elishama <S%H476><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud <S%H5989><s%>.
And over the host <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> was Gamaliel <S%H1583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedahzur <S%H6301><s%>.
And over the host <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> was Abidan <S%H27><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gideoni <S%H1441><s%>.

And the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> set forward <S%H5265><s%>, which was the rereward <S%H622><s%> of all the camps <S%H4264><s%> throughout their hosts <S%H6635><s%>: and over his host <S%H6635><s%> was Ahiezer <S%H295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammishaddai <S%H5996><s%>.
And over the host <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> was Pagiel <S%H6295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ocran <S%H5918><s%>.
And over the host <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> was Ahira <S%H299><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Enan <S%H5881><s%>.

Thus were <S%H428><s%> the journeyings <S%H4550><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> according to their armies <S%H6635><s%>, when they set forward <S%H5265><s%>. Thus: Heb. These

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Hobab <S%H2246><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Raguel <S%H7467><s%> the Midianite <S%H4084><s%>, Moses' <S%H4872><s%> father in law <S%H2859><s%>, We are journeying <S%H5265><s%> unto the place <S%H4725><s%> of which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, I will give <S%H5414><s%> it you: come <S%H3212><s%> thou with us, and we will do thee good <S%H2895><s%>: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> concerning Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto him, I will not go <S%H3212><s%>; but I will depart <S%H3212><s%> to mine own land <S%H776><s%>, and to my kindred <S%H4138><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Leave <S%H5800><s%> us not, I pray thee; forasmuch as thou knowest <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3045><s%> how we are to encamp <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and thou mayest be to us instead of eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

And it shall be, if thou go <S%H3212><s%> with us, yea, it shall be, that what goodness <S%H2896><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall do <S%H3190><s%> unto us, the same will we do <S%H2895><s%> unto thee.

And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days' <S%H3117><s%> journey <S%H1870><s%>: and the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> went <S%H5265><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them in the three <S%H7969><s%> days' <S%H3117><s%> journey <S%H1870><s%>, to search out <S%H8446><s%> a resting place <S%H4496><s%> for them.
And the cloud <S%H6051><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was upon them by day <S%H3119><s%>, when they went out <S%H5265><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%>.

And it came to pass, when the ark <S%H727><s%> set forward <S%H5265><s%>, that Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Rise up <S%H6965><s%>, LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and let thine enemies <S%H341><s%> be scattered <S%H6327><s%>; and let them that hate <S%H8130><s%> thee flee <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee.

And when it rested <S%H5117><s%>, he said <S%H559><s%>, Return <S%H7725><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, unto the many <S%H7233><s%> thousands <S%H505><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>. many thousands: Heb. ten thousand thousands
